q01.question:
Use your reddit.py with the URL https://yld.me/raw/ka1y to answer the following questions:

  1. What is score of the first post? ____
  2. What is the shortened URL of the third post? https://is.gd/____
  3. What is the title of the fourth post when limited to 8 characters? ____
  4. What is the score of the last post when sorting by title? ____

q02.question:
Use your demographics.py to answer the following questions:

  1. How many male students are in the class of 2025? ____
  2. What percentage of the 2025 class is female? ____ %
  3. Which class year had the lowest percentage of Caucasians? ____
  4. Which class year had the highest percentage of Asians? ____
  5. How many Hispanic students were in the class of 2023? ____
  6. How many Black or African American students were in the class of 2021? ____
